author: ladidan
content:
hi all, the inaugural L1-zkEVM [breakout call is set](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1900)

Wednesday, Feb 11, 2026 @ 15:00 UTC

â€”> Sign up for a [calendar invite here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdYvkF8E4w_ND_Wt6zivQ0T25aNHk5_RmR0CT9AlnwRlAo1cg/viewform?usp=dialog)

The agenda includes a recap of the L1-zkEVM roadmap as well updates from the corresponding working groups, [see more here](https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/l1-zkevm-roadmap-2026-integrating-zkevm-proofs-into-ethereums-core-protocol/27595)
